document_data.mainbody:
Tymora, Lady Luck was a Tymoran book dedicated to Tyches Fair-Haired Daughter, the deity of luck, penned sometime before the late 15 century DR.
One of the books chapters listed oaths and sayings that invoked the goddess favor. Come of them were﻿﻿﻿ "By Lady Luckss smile," "turntable Tymora, I invoke thee,"﻿ "by the rolling of my dice, please let these results be nice," "spin, spin, oh fickle fate wheel!" and "Lady of the Diamond-Glitter Dice, Mistress of Good Fortune, Sovereign of Luck, please have mercy on me, for fucks sake."
In the , a copy of Tymora, Lady Luck could be found in the library of the Stormshore Tabernacle, a non-denominational shrine in the city of Baldurs Gate.
